title: Minister welcomes Niue Language Week (Ministry of Pacific Island Affairs of New Zealand)
text: ( Source : Ministry of Pacific Island Affairs of New Zealand ) Pacific Peoples Minister Peseta Sam Lotu-Iiga is calling on all New Zealanders to take part in Niue Language Week this week. 'Niue Language Week is a chance for New Zealanders to
